con:elements.con:expectedValue: Home team and away team cannot be the same

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <SOAP-ENV:Header/> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <SOAP-ENV:Fault> <faultcode>SOAP-ENV:Server</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="en">could not execute statement [ERROR: new row for relation "matches" violates check constraint "home_team_cannot_equal_away_team" Detail: Failing row contains (1111, 2025/26, 8, 15:30, null, Liverpool, Liverpool, 1, 2).] [insert into matches (away_team,away_score,home_team,home_score,kickoff_time,match_date,match_week,season,match_id) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)]; SQL [insert into matches (away_team,away_score,home_team,home_score,kickoff_time,match_date,match_week,season,match_id) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)]; constraint [home_team_cannot_equal_away_team]</faultstring> </SOAP-ENV:Fault> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Home team cannot be null or empty

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <SOAP-ENV:Header/> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <SOAP-ENV:Fault> <faultcode>SOAP-ENV:Client</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="en">Home team cannot be null or empty</faultstring> </SOAP-ENV:Fault> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Away team cannot be null or empty

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <SOAP-ENV:Header/> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <SOAP-ENV:Fault> <faultcode>SOAP-ENV:Client</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="en">Away team cannot be null or empty</faultstring> </SOAP-ENV:Fault> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>

con:elements.con:expectedValue: home score is required and must be an integer

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <SOAP-ENV:Header/> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <SOAP-ENV:Fault> <faultcode>SOAP-ENV:Client</faultcode> <faultstring xml:lang="en">home score is required and must be an integer</faultstring> </SOAP-ENV:Fault> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
